frontmatter.title: Fail a test in Jest if an unexpected network request happens
frontmatter.description: Automatically failing unit tests with Jest in React when network requests are made will make your tests more reliable and easier to maintain

frontmatter.title: How to split the deployment of your front end and back end with the help of Consumer Driven Contract Testing
frontmatter.description: By using contract tests, you can build more independent frontend and backends that can be deployed separately. That way, you can get faster feedback
